title: Oceanic
text:
**Oceanic ECVs:**
1. Surface
    1. Sea-surface temperature
    2. Sea-surface salinity
    3. Sea level
    4. Sea state
    5. Sea ice
    6. Surface current
    7. Ocean colour
    8. Carbon dioxide partial pressure
    9. Ocean acidity
    10. Phytoplankton
2. Subsurface
    1. Temperature
    2. Salinity
    3. Current
    4. Nutrients
    5. Carbon dioxide partial pressure
    6. Ocean acidity
    7. Oxygen
    8. Tracers

For more information, see:
a) GCOS web page on ECVs
b) Guide to Climatological Practices (WMO-No. 100), Table 2.1
